Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Kingston
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Yates, 76th, South Shore Drive and 75th due to police activity near 75th/Kingston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Yates, 76th, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 75th due to police activity near 75th/Kingston.

Allow extra travel time.
